name: Türkçe
sizeExceedsMax: Dosya boyutu izin verilen maksimum boyutu aşıyor.

name: English
sizeExceedsMax: File size exceeds the maximum allowed size.
typeMismatch: The file type information did not match completely.
excelReadError: An error occurred while reading the Excel file: ${error.message}
fileUploadError: An error occurred while uploading the file.
